info.name: Clean ROBLOX
info.description:
v0.6.2 Beta. The most hard-worked Style in the ROBLOX section!

Colour Schemes are in the "Notes" section

_______

To get the best experience out of this stand-alone Style please disable all other Styles for ROBLOX.

Shall I add the ability to set your own backgrounds here?
info.additionalInfo:
Do not reupload a modified or complete version, also including snippets, of this style.

Colours

Defaults

#F2F2F2 | Default Light

#444444 | Default Dark

Candle Wax Colours

#D66767 | Red

#D267D6 | Purple

#679BD6 | Blue

#67D6D2 | Cyan

#6FD667 | Green

#D2D667 | Yellow

Pastel Colours

#E7D0D0 | Red

#D3E7D0 | Green

#D0D1E7 | Blue

Changelog v0.6.2b - 30th May 2017 - - - - - Sorry for the delay guys :( *don't expect a new update anytime soon, this theme has gotten so big it just seems impractical editing it in a single file. I plan to make myself a more fluid environment to edit in which should allow me to push out an update the moment I'm happy with it :) - Added ONE extra recent game (Home) - Rearranged Profile Page - Added Sidebar for Games page - Adjusted Messages page, better functionality - New Avatar page! - Fixed Game Card text - Fixed scaling issues on Game page - Fixed search suggestion background - Fixed issue that didn't allow people to opt out of Icons8 * There are still some theme issues which affect people who have changed the colour scheme of this theme. I will work on this when using the new dev environment, but for now try and stick to brighter colours c; v0.5b - 13th Feb 2017 - - - - - - New Colour Scheming system (early preview)! - Changed the settings dropdown - Ability to switch between light or dark icons v0.4b - 10th Feb 2017 - - - - - - New Messages layout - New Catalog item layout - Minor support for rplus (not a fan of it though tbh) - Fixed chatbox dialogs (hopefully) - Added ability to change header colour line v0.3b - 8th Feb 2017 - - - - - - Worked on the Game overview. Cleaned up quite a lot actually! - Redone the Developer page as a request. I know there are no tabs at this time. - Small touches here and there. (I'll work on the chat issue and profile issue soon I promise :)) v0.2b - 5th Feb 2017 - - - - - - Rearranged Home, Profile & Game page. - Changed Logo - Added icons from Icons8
Credits CSS by 4reeeal [ No Redistribution ] https://www.roblox.com/users/1891946/profile Icons created & hosted by icons8! [ Free to use with credit ] https://icons8.com/ Cloud Photo by hongmyeon @ Pixabay! [ CC0 Public Domain ] https://pixabay.com/en/sky-cloud-sunshine-summer-solar-383823/
